DOC.brief_summary: The present study examine whether serum FGF-23 serum phosphate baseline kidney transplant recipient predict progression allograft dysfunction 3 year all-cause mortality 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Fibroblast Growth Factor 23 ( FGF-23 ) Serum Phosphate Allograft Function Mortality Kidney Allograft Recipients
DOC.criteria: least one year posttransplantation 10 % increase serum creatinine past 3 month refuse participate study acute illness
